com.game.graphics

Class CameraObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Camera
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera
        • com.game.graphics.CameraObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Follower<Movable>, Movable

    public class CameraObject
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera
implements Movable, Follower<Movable>
    Classe che instanzia una camera basata sulle dimensioni del frame e che non oltrepassa le dimensioni della tiled map
